channel.title: Help >.>
channel.description: I`m new to coding and i wanna get into it but i have NO clue what to do in client.java and stuff. Can somebody post a tutorial or help me please?

item.title: Help >.>
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

wow…Just wow wtf is up with you noobs lately… you make the least descriptive topic titles and expect everyone to spoon feed you…

THERE IS A THING CALLED THE SEARCH BUTTON USE IT

did you even look at the tut section i a mean really Only a person with no common sense would post this…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2008, 02:05:41 pm[/size][hr]I will bring you your food once and only once but i am certainly not spoon feeding you…

Here are some useful tuts
Link to tut section: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,51.0.html
My Multi-Tut: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,328858.0.html
NPC Dialogue Tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,329218.0.html
Making a server: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285415.0.html
Strong Ip ban: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,322520.0.html
I take credit for the multi-tut and that is it everything else belongs the the poster

item.title: Help >.>

item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

spam topic in all honesty… and it depends what you want to do with your server… but there is a search button for a reason. ALWAYS try to use the search button before posting a topic here, you might be suprised by what kind of tuts you can find or answers on other topics.
